metadata.Title: CVE-2017-7674 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
The CORS Filter in Apache Tomcat 9.0.0.M1 to 9.0.0.M21, 8.5.0 to 8.5.15,8.0.0.RC1 to 8.0.44 and 7.0.41 to 7.0.78 did not add an HTTP Vary headerindicating that the response varies depending on Origin. This permittedclient and server side cache poisoning in some circumstances.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-7674` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libservlet3.0-java - 7.0.52-1ubuntu0.13
libtomcat7-java - 7.0.52-1ubuntu0.13
tomcat7 - 7.0.52-1ubuntu0.13
tomcat7-admin - 7.0.52-1ubuntu0.13
tomcat7-common - 7.0.52-1ubuntu0.13
tomcat7-examples - 7.0.52-1ubuntu0.13
tomcat7-user - 7.0.52-1ubuntu0.13
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tomcat7 package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.0.52-1ubuntu0.13').
